import React, { useState } from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' const Buttom = ({set, text}) => const Statistics = ({typeofData, data}) =>

{typeofData} {data}

const App = () => { // save clicks of each button to own state const [good, setGood] = useState(0) const [neutral, setNeutral] = useState(0) const [bad, setBad] = useState(0) let all = good+bad+neutral let average = (good-bad)/all let positive = good/all return (

give feedback

setGood(good+1)} text={"Good"}/> setNeutral(neutral+1)} text={"Neutral"}/> setBad(bad+1)} text={"Bad"}/>

statistics

) } ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById('root'))
